description: Register a scientific domain (realm) for use in CMIP7
title: Link Scientific Domain to CMIP7:

field_guidance.header:
Scientific domains (realms) are initially defined in the [WCRP-constants repository](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants). You can view existing domains at https://wcrp-cmip.github.io/WCRP-constants/scientific_domain/

**If your scientific domain is not listed below**, you must first [register it in WCRP-constants](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/issues/new?template=scientific_domain.yml) and wait for it to be approved before linking it here.

Once your scientific domain exists in WCRP-constants, use this form to make it available for use in CMIP7.
